tool_description: This API provides on a quasi-daily basis, the amount of carbon dioxide (CO2) in the atmosphere from 2010.01.01 to the present. It is expressed as a mole fraction in dry air, parts per million (ppm).
title: Daily atmosphere  carbon dioxide concentration

api_list.name: Carbon dioxide endpoint
api_list.description: The response will be an object with no CORS resources enabled.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-atmosphere-carbon-dioxide-concentration.p.rapidapi.com/api/co2-api"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-atmosphere-carbon-dioxide-concentration.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
